body: Yooooooooooooooooooo these theories are blowing mind right now
I tried, but I can’t fap to this.

@hentaitigas not sure what you mean. The phrase means that mom and uncle are siblings. First chap, they're adopted siblings. 3rd chap i guess dad raise his daughter as his sister right, she calls him oniisan. So, does that mean the kid in 2nd chap is the the result of 3rd chap?
@jerer I get it now. The kid said "My mom is having a baby at my uncle's." That explains it

@Jerer Really ? I see no connection at all. What the woman raped in the train is actually the sibling's mother in chapter 1 or something like that? Thing is, there is no link at all between chapter 2 and chapter 1&3. So...
@Jerer still couldn't find any connection of 2nd chapter with 1st and 3rd chapter
Fun fact the 2nd story is also connected to the 1st and 3rd chapter just pay more attention
Oh! I just realized the 3rd story is the continuation of the 1st one. That MC is totally needed in the ntr tag.

That isn't that bad, but that 3rd story when her mother suicide cuz her brother forced her to sex and have kid with him and later he rape her daugther and she know why her mother suicide, wtf that was very sad...
his sister suicide then he fuck his daugther dafuq
Personally I wouldn't call it good art, but to me it doesn't fit the stories. I prefer the horror based works this artists has done.
Great drawing but the stories suck. What a shame.
